Episode 0: Testing

It’s been over a year and I’ve shared no updates, but here’s a test of hosting a podcast on here.

This is Episode #0 of my friend Phillip An’s podcast. The podcast is currently nameless, but this test episode is Il Chiaretto.

Here is the rss link. Give it a listen and share your thoughts.
